CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh courier newspaper, October 28, 1950, pg. 11 reads: "Birthday Celebrants...last Friday included Mrs. Sadie Black Hamilton, 92 years young, and Mrs. Ira F. Lewis. Pictured with Mrs. Gertrude L. Brooks, left, and Mrs. Lucy Robinson, far right, the two honorees shared the gala occasion which was sponsored by the Frances Harper League.  Mrs. Hamilton was a founder of the league, and, with Mrs. Brooks, received pioneer certificates from the NACW for their club activities.  The league presented Mrs. Hamilton with a birthday cake and a fountain pen. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Gertrude L. Brooks, Harriet Lewis and Sadie Black Hamilton, guests of honor; and Lucy Robinson, standing in interior with light colored lace curtains, oriental rug, chairs and table with flowers in vase for Frances Harper League event
